TopicTitle: [1.0.4] EnginesPlus! THE BIG UPDATE HAS ARRIVED! :D (2.0)

Articles.Content:
![XZw2fj8.png](http://i.imgur.com/XZw2fj8.png)

![a3yGqvW.png](http://i.imgur.com/a3yGqvW.png)

The EnginesPlus Mod is designed to fill in some of the gaps in stock KSP. An example is the Mainsail, the Skipper and the Poodle are 2.5m engines. But in 1.25m we only have the LVT-30/45 and the Terrier. So the 1.25m Skipper is missing.

![BqvZzfr.png](http://i.imgur.com/BqvZzfr.png)

There are 7 engines in this mod. And believe it or not, we have 3 fuel tanks as well!

> 
> ![xVivLhH.png](http://i.imgur.com/xVivLhH.png)
> 
> This engine is the little brother of the Skipper and was designed as a landing engine where the Terrier is too weak and the Swivel is too powerful, making this engine a nice little in-between. 

> 
> ![oKYUEPi.png](http://i.imgur.com/oKYUEPi.png)
> 
> Are you all about power and not efficiency? Then this engine is not for you! The Rottweiler is the 3.75m brother of the Poodle, and is very good for space where you need efficiency! 

> 
> ![bYCN8oq.png](http://i.imgur.com/bYCN8oq.png)
> 
> The Vase nuclear engine was designed for small probes where efficiency was needed. Note, no Kerbal Engineers where harmed in the making of this engine! They're just a bit radioactive, that's all. 

> 
> ![rcti8oE.png](http://i.imgur.com/rcti8oE.png)
> 
> Seeing that it got it's 0.625 brother, Astro Inc decided to give the Nerv a BIGGER brother, and so, the Tsar was constructed. 

> 
> ![XVzAfCg.png](http://i.imgur.com/XVzAfCg.png)
> 
> The Aeroneedle's name obviously gives away that it is related to the Aerospike. But this one is big enough to hold it's own amount of fuel. 

> 
> ![7KqvSEm.png](http://i.imgur.com/7KqvSEm.png)
> 
> This is the biggest engine you can buy at AstroTech Inc. Almost resembling a turnip a small bit at the base, the awesomeness of this engine will make you flip your (vege)table. 

> 
> ![r5LgIAW.png](http://i.imgur.com/r5LgIAW.png)
> 
> A smaller version of the LVT-45, this engine was designed for small rockets that need that extra "Uumph!" that the Spark doesn't have. 

> 
> ![258zXLj.png](http://i.imgur.com/258zXLj.png)
> 
> AstroTech Inc has constructed many nuclear engines, but they only run on liquid fuel, and getting rid of the oxidizer leaves a small amout of liquid fuel left with tons of unused space, so AstroTech Inc has developed their first three fuel tanks to counteract this problem! There are 3 variants. 

![xnAad9b.png](http://i.imgur.com/xnAad9b.png)

The download is here!

KerbalStuff: [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/952/AstroGamer%27s%20EnginesPlus%20Mod](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/952/AstroGamer%27s%20EnginesPlus%20Mod)

Thank you for viewing (or downloading) my mod! To show support, you can put this badge in your signature! To do so, copy the Image URL and paste it in you sig as you would normally paste pictures. Then, copy the link of this page, and highlight the badge in your signature. Click the link Icon, and put in the link, and there you go! A working badge! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![mj28cNj.png](http://i.imgur.com/mj28cNj.png)

Changelog:

    2.0Gave a huge overhaul to all of the models and textures.1.8Fixed Tsars thrustTransform. Added 3 new fuel tanks!1.6Fixed a bug where the Firework wasn't able to be unlocked in Science mode.1.4Added Firework.1.2Added Supernova!Fixed the Tsar's thrust.1.0Added AeroneedleOFFICIAL RELEASE OF THIS MOD! 0.8Added a 2.5 Nuke called Tsar. 1 update more until the official release of this mod! 0.6Added a 0.625 Nuke called Vase0.4Fixed a bug where in the VAB/SPH the fairings are visible. Thanks wasml!Added the Rottweiler0.2Initial Release,Added Private.

If you need somebody to bash together configs, I could help... sort of. (I'm new at it, but I'm decent at copying Wikipedia information into .cfg files... and I really want some of the more obscure Soviet OMS engines in my stock game. No idea why.). Also, looks like your textures could use a little more detail. Make the engines look a little beat up, like the stock engines do... or at least add little color variations and stuff. Otherwise it looks kind of obviously painted.

Engine requests: 3.75m NERVA. Almost the size of the real one. Also, 2.5m bent RAPIER with intake and precooler all in one bit, Skylon-style.
